name: Ice Devil
description: The Ice Devil is a towering, insect-like fiend with a hard, icy exoskeleton and a long, spiked tail. Known for its cold demeanor and mastery over ice, it wields powerful polearms and can command frigid air to summon ice storms.
memorable: This creature is formidable with its ability to create walls of ice and summon snowstorms, showcasing a mix of martial prowess and tactical brilliance.
goals: Usual goals include leading infernal armies and spreading chaos through icy realms.
relations: Often serves as a lieutenant to greater devils and commands lesser fiends.
environment: Typically found in frozen realms of the Nine Hells or icy environments.
strengths: High resilience against cold and ice-based attacks, immunity to fire and poison, and the ability to manipulate the battlefield with ice and snow.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and can be outsmarted by clever opponents exploiting its strategic tendencies.
attacks: Employs a Multiattack feature with powerful bite, claws, and tail strikes, delivering piercing and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ice Wall ability creates barriers that control the battlefield and inflict heavy cold damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight, allowing it to see in complete darkness, which gives it a significant advantage in combat.
skills: Very perceptive with a passive perception score of 13, aiding in awareness during encounters.
additional_information: Emits an aura of lawful evil, influencing nearby creatures
Can use bonus actions to create barriers or hinder opponents
Has magic resistance providing advantages against spells
Equipped with exceptional physical and magical attributes
Utilizes strategic thinking in combat scenarios
test_queries: devil that commands ice storms and snow
creature resistant to cold and fire damage
large fiend with a spiked tail and ice wall
